description:
Create smooth brews in the backcountry with the Chesnut C Series Grinder. The grippy aluminum body makes it easy to hold and the long handle makes grinding effortless. The super adjustable grinder gives you the grounds you want to make you a backwood barista.

  • Made of Aluminum with a stainless-steel grinder to make it last
  • Easily adjustable 36 step grinder makes the grinds just how you want them
  • CNC machined double bearing grinder makes consistent grounds effortlessly
  • Holds 25g of coffee beans
  • Easy to dissemble and clean and comes with cleaning brush
name: Timemore TIMEMORE Chesnut C Series Grinder
